title: Google assistant no longer allowed to take screenshot?
content: I have a Pixel 5 running the November update. Is it still possible to take a screenshot using Google Assistant by saying, "hey google, take a screenshot"? It doesn't work on my phone, but I've found numerous references to it on these boards and other help sites. Has that skill been removed from google assistant? Do I need to enable some obscure setting buried deep? Thanks!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
